welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Windlesham, a charming village in the heart of the United Kingdom. Known for its beautiful countryside and historic landmarks, we invite you to explore and immerse yourselves in the rich culture and warm hospitality of our community. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The newest terminal at Heathrow Airport, serving mainly long-haul flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: One of the busiest terminals at Heathrow Airport, serving mainly international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: The smallest terminal at Heathrow Airport, serving mainly European and long-haul flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 5
terminals.description: The largest terminal at Heathrow Airport, serving mainly British Airways and other airlines.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport for up to 45 minutes.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at RAF Station Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at RAF Station Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Northolt Airport handles all commercial flights and is equipped with modern facilities for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Northolt Airport caters to private and charter flights, providing exclusive services for VIP travelers.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport for all travelers.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lasham Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Lasham Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at London Elstree Aerodrome Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Goodwood Airport offers modern facilities and amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Goodwood Airport caters to VIP and executive travelers with exclusive services and amenities.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
